title: JSON schema for JSCS configuration files

___checkRedundantParams.description: Ensures params in jsdoc contains type

___checkParamNames.description: Ensures param names in jsdoc and in function declaration are equal

___maximumLineLength.description: Requires all lines to be at most the number of characters specified.

___requireCamelCaseOrUpperCaseIdentifier.description: Requires identifiers to be camelCased or UPPERCASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

___disallowTrailingComma.description: Disallows an extra comma following the final element of an array or object literal.

___disallowSpacesInsideArrayBrackets.description: Disallows space after opening array square bracket and before closing.

___requireBlocksOnNewline.description: Requires blocks to begin and end with a newline.

___excludeFiles.description: Disables style checking for specified paths.

___disallowYodaConditions.description: Requires the variable to be the left hand operator when doing a boolean comparison.

___requireDotNotation.description: Requires member expressions to use dot notation when possible.

___checkRedundantParams.description: Ensures params in jsdoc contains type

___checkParamNames.description: Ensures param names in jsdoc and in function declaration are equal

___requireLineFeedAtFileEnd.description: Requires placing line feed at file end.

___disallowEmptyBlocks.description: Disallows empty blocks (except for catch blocks).

___requireParenthesesAroundIIFE.description: Requires parentheses around immediately invoked function expressions.

___disallowPaddingNewlinesInBlocks.description: Disallows blocks from beginning and ending with 2 newlines.

___requireAlignedObjectValues.description: Requires proper alignment in object literals.

___requireCapitalizedConstructors.description: Requires constructors to be capitalized (except for "this")

___disallowTrailingWhitespace.description: Requires all lines to end on a non-whitespace character.

___validateIndentation.description: Validates indentation for arrays, objects, switch statements, and block statements.

___disallowCommaBeforeLineBreak.description: Disallows commas as last token on a line in lists.

___requireSpacesInsideArrayBrackets.description: Requires space after opening array square bracket and before closing.

___disallowQuotedKeysInObjects.description: Disallows quoted keys in object if possible.

___disallowMixedSpacesAndTabs.description: Requires lines to not contain both spaces and tabs consecutively, or spaces after tabs only for alignment if "smart"

___disallowMultipleLineStrings.description: Disallows strings that span multiple lines without using concatenation.

___disallowSpaceBeforeBlockStatements.description: Disallows space before block statements (for loops, control structures).

___safeContextKeyword.description: Option to check "var that = this" expressions.

___requireSpaceBeforeBlockStatements.description: Requires space before block statements (for loops, control structures).

___requirePaddingNewlinesInBlocks.description: Requires blocks to begin and end with 2 newlines.

___disallowDanglingUnderscores.description: Disallows identifiers that start or end in '_', except for some popular exceptions:

___disallowSpacesInsideParentheses.description: Disallows space after opening round bracket and before closing.

___disallowSpacesInsideObjectBrackets.description: Disallows space after opening object curly brace and before closing.

___validateLineBreaks.description: Option to check line break characters.

___requireTrailingComma.description: Requires an extra comma following the final element of an array or object literal.

___preset.description: Extends defined rules with preset rules.

___validateQuoteMarks.description: Requires all quote marks to be either the supplied value, or consistent if true

___requireLeftStickedOperators.description: Requires sticking operators to the left.

___requireCommaBeforeLineBreak.description: Requires commas as last token on a line in lists.

___requireSpacesInsideObjectBrackets.description: Requires space after opening object curly brace and before closing.

___disallowMultipleLineBreaks.description: Disallows multiple blank lines in a row.
